parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the workflow. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.description:
Filter condition: The type of the workflow. The default value is CycleWorkflow.

Valid values:

*   CycleWorkflow
*   ManualWorkflow

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the data to retrieve, used for pagination.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The page number of the data to retrieve, used for pagination.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description:
The DataWorks workspace ID. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the Workspace page to query the ID.

You must configure this parameter to specify the DataWorks workspace to which the API operation is applied.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
Filter condition: The type of the workflow. The default value is CycleWorkflow.

Valid values:

*   CycleWorkflow
*   ManualWorkflow
